description: [DEPRECATED] This preset is deprecated and now acts as a compatibility alias. It simply
extends the default preset in this repository to preserve backwards compatibility.
Set commit message fields at the package-rule level with a catch-all match ('*') rather
than at the root. Root-level fields can be overridden by more specific sub-configs and
packageRules from composed presets. By defining commitMessageAction/topic/extra in
a packageRule that matches every dependency, this baseline is applied uniformly after
composition, while still allowing even more specific packageRules to override it when needed.

prBodyNotes:
---
> [!WARNING]
> #### Deprecated preset: `Kong/public-shared-renovate:backend`
>
> Your config references a deprecated preset. To prevent disruption, this file temporarily acts as a compatibility alias. This preset is now an alias that simply extends `Kong/public-shared-renovate` (the default preset).
>
> #### Action required
>
> Update your Renovate config to extend directly from `Kong/public-shared-renovate`.
>
> #### Examples
>
> Before (any of the following):
>
> ```json
> { "extends": ["Kong/public-shared-renovate:backend"] }
> { "extends": ["Kong/public-shared-renovate:backend.json"] }
> { "extends": ["local>Kong/public-shared-renovate:backend"] }
> { "extends": ["github>Kong/public-shared-renovate:backend"] }
> ```
>
> After:
>
> ```json
> { "extends": ["Kong/public-shared-renovate"] }
> ```
>
> #### Timeline
>
> This alias will be removed in **January 2026**.
